content: Arguably, Tillerson has a lot more diplomacy experience than anyone in the last 30 years in this job, mainly because he has dealt with harder negotiations and more risky long term contract negotiations with more Nations than anyone else. his entire job history is negotiating with foreign Governments to get them to give up resources they did not want to give up. That said, Hillary and Kerry were openly pushing for open hostilities and maybe fighting Russia, so anything at this point is better than what we would have seen with Hillary Clinton in charge.
